name: Super Tuber Jump
description:
Welcome to Super Tuber Jump

In this game, Our lovely youtuber constantly moves to the right and to the left, our youtubers will change direction automatically after impacting the reigns walls. you can use a variety of jumps to advance during the course of the game. Avoid the neighbor enemies (or kill them) meanwhile you gather raft coins and reach the goal.

How it works?
Jump smartly, avoid the enemies , gather coins and reach the highest score

Game Modes
- Standard game play: Jump smartly, avoid the enemies and gather coins
- Reigns game mode: Walls become more sensitive, game becomes harder. Requires to be unblocked
- Happy room game mode: Super challenge , sensitive walls, be careful,enemies will explode! Requires to be unblocked!
- Party hard game mode: Mega challenge . Enemies will fall down with a glowing knife, you need to avoid them meanwhile you progress on the course of the game. Requires to be unblocked!

In the next party hard mode you will be able to compete with your friends and climb high in the ranking,also you will be granted to choose between different scenarios, like the happy room scenario, creating a perfect game combo! Happy room is part of the party hard mode. We are introducing new scenarios and now we are currently working on the hello neighbor scenario, full of surprises!

This game contain some ads but those are not intrusive at all. In the next version of the game we will be introducing a functionality to disabled it through in-app.

This game is still in his early steps. In the new few weeks we will be adding a lot of new content and new functionality!
